Control Name: 1.8.7 Azure resources are connecting to the internet via on-premises.
Control Statement: Tunnelling internet traffic through on-premises can add extra cost as data has to go back to local network before it reaches the internet, this cost should be acknowledged.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 1.8 How do you manage networking costs for this workload?
control_attributes.Control: 1.8.7 Azure resources are connecting to the internet via on-premises.
control_attributes.Description: Tunnelling internet traffic through on-premises can add extra cost as data has to go back to local network before it reaches the internet, this cost should be acknowledged.
